question:
Which among the following statements about Gangetic plains is/are correct?
  1. It spreads in the countries Nepal, Bangladesh and India
  2. It is bounded by the Thar desert in the East and the Ganges Delta in the west.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
The Gangetic Plains is the large space of level, made by the Ganges River in the northern parts of India. It borders the surrounding areas of Himalayas.Â  It is an important part of the countries of India, Nepal, and Bangladesh.
It is bounded by:
Thar Desert - West
Himalayas - North
Ganges Delta - East
Vindhyas and Satpuras - South
